locations.name: Blighted Village
locations.description: An abandoned village, now occupied by goblins

locations.name: Emerald Grove
locations.description: A sacred grove and home to druids, and temporary refuge for a group of tiefling refugees

locations.name: Forest
locations.description: A patch of woodland west of the grove

locations.name: Goblin Camp
locations.description: An old Selûnite temple in use as a base of operations for the Cult of the Absolute

locations.name: Mountain Pass
locations.description: A trail at the edge of the wilderness, leading off to Rosymorn Monastery

locations.name: Overgrown Ruins
locations.description: A large ruin near to the grove, with the remnants of what was once a chapel

locations.name: Ravaged Beach
locations.description: A beach along the river Chionthar, now strewn with the remains of a crashed Nautiloid

locations.name: Sunlit Wetlands
locations.description: Picturesque wetlands that give way to a Putrid Bog when held under scrutiny

locations.name: The Risen Road
locations.description: A long stretch of road that connects Elturel and Baldur's Gate, running parallel to the river Chionthar

locations.name: Waukeen's Rest
locations.description: An inn on the Risen Road, in flames after an assault from the Absolute

locations.name: Rosymorn Monastery Trail
locations.description: A pilgrimage trail leading between the wilderness, Rosymorn Monastary and the Shadow-Cursed Lands

locations.name: Rosymorn Monastery
locations.description: A seculded monastery for monks of Lathander

locations.name: Creche Y'llek
locations.description: Rosymorn Monastery's living quarters, transformed into a githyanki base

locations.name: Arcane Tower
locations.description: An isolated wizard tower protected by Arcane Cannons

locations.name: Ebonlake Grotto
locations.description: Home of the myconids, lead by Sovereign Spaw

locations.name: Decrepit Village
locations.description: An abandoned village on a beach beside the Ebonlake

locations.name: Dread Hollow
locations.description: A cavernous hollow growing a large Sussur tree

locations.name: The Festering Cove
locations.description: A hidden cove, home to followers of BOOOAL

locations.name: Selûnite Outpost
locations.description: An abandoned outpost which previously housed followers of Selûne

locations.name: Storehouse
locations.description: A lone storehouse with an elevator leading to the surface

locations.name: Grymforge
locations.description: The legendary Grymforge, built by Sharran worshippers in times past

locations.name: Nautiloid
locations.description: A flying illithid ship visited during the prologue, travelling through the Hells

locations.name: Astral Plane
locations.description: A small section of the Astral Sea

locations.name: Ruined Battlefield
locations.description: A large battlefield spanning half the region, with remnants of a conflict from before the shadow curse

locations.name: Last Light Inn
locations.description: A sanctuary within the Shadow-Cursed Lands, currently occupied by Harpers and members of the Flaming Fist

locations.name: Reithwin Town
locations.description: A now empty town, previously home to followers of Selûne and the Thorm family

locations.name: Grand Mausoleum
locations.description: The Thorm family mausoleum, resting place of Melodia Thorm and entrance to the Gauntlet of Shar

locations.name: Moonrise Towers
locations.description: The seat of the Absolute and base of their operations, located south of Reithwin Town

locations.name: Shadowfell
locations.description: A plane of shadows and domain of Shar

locations.name: Rivington
locations.description: The southern-most district of Baldur's Gate, located on the southern shore of the River Chionthar and south of of Wyrm's Crossing

locations.name: Arfur's Mansion
locations.description: The home of toymaker Arfur Gregorio

locations.name: Circus of the Last Days
locations.description: An extraplanar circus run by ringmaster Lucretious

locations.name: Open Hand Temple
locations.description: A temple dedicated to Ilmater, grieving after the loss of their head priest

locations.name: Requisitioned Barn
locations.description: A large barn, currently in use as storage for refugee requisitions

locations.name: South Span Checkpoint
locations.description: An intermediate checkpoint between Rivington and Wyrm's Crossing

locations.name: Sword Coast Couriers
locations.description: Rivington's post office, complete with pigeon carriers

locations.name: Rivington General
locations.description: A weapons and armour store, run by Gyldro Angleiron and his clerk Exxvikyap

locations.name: Wyrm's Crossing
locations.description: A crossing between Rivington and the Lower City of Baldur's Gate

locations.name: Danthelon's Dancing Axe
locations.description: A weapons and armour store owned by Entharl Danthelon, as well as a front to a Harper hideout

locations.name: Sharess' Caress
locations.description: A house of pleasure run by Mamzell Amira and Kira

locations.name: Wyrm's Rock Fortress
locations.description: An island-fortress which serves as one of the Flaming Fist's headquarters

locations.name: Lower City
locations.description: The mercantile hub and southernmost region of the port-side city of Baldur's Gate

locations.name: Baldur's Mouth
locations.description: A print shop for news broadsheets, run by editor Ettvard

locations.name: Basilisk Gate Barracks
locations.description: Barracks for the Flaming Fist and location of Heapside Prison

locations.name: Bloomridge Park
locations.description: A large park in the north of the Lower City

locations.name: Candulhallow's Tombstones
locations.description: An unassuming funerary store nestled along a back street

locations.name: Counting House
locations.description: A banking and storage facility found along the southern coast of the Lower City

locations.name: Devil's Fee
locations.description: A curio store run by Helsik

locations.name: Elerrathin's Home
locations.description: The home of Jaheira and her wards, with a large, lush basement cavern

locations.name: Elfsong Tavern
locations.description: A well-known tavern, popular with adventurers and independent operators

locations.name: Felogyr's Fireworks
locations.description: A fireworks store in the south-east of the city

locations.name: Flymm Cargo
locations.description: A dock-side warehouse and access point to the Lower City Sewers and Iron Throne

locations.name: Forge of the Nine
locations.description: An outdoor smithy, possibly run by Dammon

locations.name: Graveyard (Lower City)
locations.description: The Lower City's graveyard, housing several mausoleums and a morgue

locations.name: House of Grief
locations.description: A healing house run by Sharran cultists, and aboveground facade to their cloister

locations.name: Lady Jannath's Estate
locations.description: The home of Lady Jannath and her husband, the artist Oskar Fevras

locations.name: Lustrous Lass
locations.description: A cursed ship docked at Greyharbour

locations.name: Old Garlow's Place
locations.description: A somewhat rundown house and hideout for a group of hag survivors

locations.name: Philgrave's Mansion
locations.description: A waterside mansion and home of Mystic Carrion

locations.name: Steel Watch Foundry
locations.description: Factory for Gortash's Steel Watch, found near the Grey Harbour

locations.name: Sorcerous Sundries
locations.description: A large magical marketplace, run by the renound wizard Lorroakan

locations.name: Stormshore Tabernacle
locations.description: A house of worship in the north-eastern part of the city

locations.name: Szarr Palace
locations.description: Palace of Cazador Szarr and home to his vampire spawn

locations.name: The Blushing Mermaid
locations.description: A large tavern with an old ship's bow protruding from the side

locations.name: Wine Festival
locations.description: A small festival taking place on the Highberry's home porch, hosted by Cora Highberry

locations.name: The Lodge
locations.description: Headquarters of the Society of Brilliance, perched high above the Greyharbour Docks

locations.name: Water Queen's House
locations.description: An outdoor temple to Bitch Queen Umberlee, overseen by Wavemistress Allandra Grey

locations.name: Lower City Sewers
locations.description: A large sewerage network beneath the Lower City

locations.name: Undercity Ruins
locations.description: The remains of an old city, located in a vast cavern beneath Baldur's Gate

locations.name: Upper City
locations.description: A wealthy region in Baldur's Gate, home to its patriar families

locations.name: Astral Plane*
locations.description: A small section of the Astral Sea

locations.name: House of Hope
locations.description: Raphael's home in the hells
